titleStmt.title: Newes from Rome, Spaine, Palermo, Geneuæ and France With the miserable state of the citty of Paris, and the late yeelding vppe of sundrie towns of great strength, vnto the king. Translated out of Italian and French into English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Wolfe?] for Thomas Nelson, and are to be sold by William Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral Library.
